comments.body: Why is this error reported if we are reporting 2388 on earlier statement. I would assume it to assume m1 as non static.

currently from the compiler perspective these two declarations are different since they were not merged so we processed separately. This test was added to make sure that we won't regress in error reporting on mixed static\instance members (and this matches the behavior in master). I do agree that this is not the best possible experience and we can certainly file an issue to track and fix it. However I would prefer to do this in a different PR
